at:content.xh:p: Merry Christmas all, I hope that Santa got you everything you asked for.

This post is just an excuse for me to mess around with XSLTForms, Alain Couthures fantastic implementation of the XForms spec. I've used it to implement a basic calculator to determine the environmental impact of Bitcoin based on its current price.
Xforms is more proof, as if it were needed, that abandoning XML was and continues to be the webs biggest mistake.
